content: Hi, I would like to sell these Polymerbit notes:  Lot #1 :  100 mXMR , World Crypto Conference in Las Vegas, #20/50I bought it from someone who couldn't prove it was funded. Mystery funding. Lot #2 : 5 mbtc , Crypto Valley Edition, #22/50Not loadedLot #3 : 1 BTC Test V1, not numbered, mintage is 50Starting bid per lot: 0.0005 BTCMinimum bid increments on each lot : 0.0001 BTC End time : Friday 21th July 2023, 23h UTC+2 (Paris time) - Countdown TimerSniping : Bids within 10 minutes before the auction end extend the auction for 10 minutes.Payment : 3CXFghQDVBPJpemYUgerTY7mzYiYsT3b1wShipping : $10 worldwide with trackingEscrow accepted, winner pays fees.
